short_description: fastpath function to round all the TargetColumns upto N decimal places as specified in the argument PrecisionDigit.
long_description: fastpath function to round all the TargetColumns upto N decimal places as specified in the argument PrecisionDigit.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns for which data needs to be round upto N decimal places.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns for which data needs to be round upto N decimal places.

argument_clauses.name: PrecisionDigit
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the N decimal places to which rounding needs to be done for the TargetColumns. IF positive, rounding happens right of the decimal, otherwise left of the decimal. It rounds to 0 decimal places if not provided.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the N decimal places to which rounding needs to be done for the TargetColumns. IF positive, rounding happens right of the decimal, otherwise left of the decimal. It rounds to 0 decimal places if not provided.

argument_clauses.name: Accumulate
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns to copy to the output table. By default, the function copies no input table columns to the output table.
